name: NewLanguageBlogVariation
description:
Create a new language variation from an existing blog post.

Use this tool to generate a new language version of an existing blog post on HubSpot CMS. It's useful for expanding the reach of content to different language audiences.

parameters.name: blog_post_id
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post you want to clone into a new language variation.

value_schema.description: ID of blog post to clone.

parameters.name: target_language
parameters.description: The language code for the target language of the new blog post variation (e.g., 'fr' for French).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of blog post to clone.

value_schema.description: ID of blog post to clone.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
